ModMetaData.name: LMC017.采矿装备
ModMetaData.author: Rikiki
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html This mod adds the MiningCo. mining helmet and vest (equipped with a light). See the forum thread for content/changelog. https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=14711.msg153940#msg153940\n\n这个MOD添加了采矿集团科技中的矿工帽和马甲（均配有光源）\n\n汉化：jxb12306
